The Class CMyLibFunctions.
Class is formed to make general functions that can be reused in the program by the team. It is a customized library for this particular project FUTURE EXTENSION NOTE: the class can be extended to accommodate more functions to remove same functions used in different activities or to add more features in the app

Version:
1.1
Author:
Ankit Goyal

Method Detail

showProgress

public void showProgress(boolean show,
                         LinearLayout onTrueVisibleLayout,
                         LinearLayout onTrueHiddenLayout)
Show progress. hides and displays the layouts or basically swaps between the two layouts

Parameters:
show - the show progress layout or not
onTrueVisibleLayout - the Layout you want to show when the boolean "show" is true
onTrueHiddenLayout - the Layout you want to hide when the boolean "show" is true

displayResult

public void displayResult(String textToShow,
                          LinearLayout layoutThatContainsText,
                          Context contextActivity)
remove previous views and add a view with the text passed. used to display and add dynamic text and text views

Parameters:
textToShow - the pass the text to be displayed on the screen
layoutThatContainsText - the layout that contains text.
contextActivity - the activity's context in which the function is called
